entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
